meanings.definition: Theophyllines: a group of drugs used to treat asthma and other respiratory conditions.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed theophyllines to help me breathe better during asthma attacks.
meanings.sent2: The hospital keeps a supply of theophyllines on hand for patients with respiratory issues.
meanings.sent3: Why did the asthma patient bring theophyllines to the comedy show? In case they needed a breath of fresh air!
meanings.sent4: Theophyllines are like a safety net, always there to support your lungs when they need it most.
meanings.sent5: As theophyllines entered his system, he felt a wave of relief wash over him, making each breath easier.
